title: ActInf OrgStream 005.1 ~ Anna-Marie Swan, "Ecological Organisations"
description:
"Ecological organisations: reimagining our organisations and communities as radically responsible and responsive ecosystem members"

Anna-Marie Swan, author of the Ecological Organisations Framework, introduces us to ecological relationships, the assumptions the framework rests on, and why recognising our organisations and communities as rich webs of ecological relationships matters.

https://annamarieswan.com
https://annamarieswan.substack.com/p/the-ecological-organisations-framework
